description:
Peter and Misslim get locked in a room together, and the only way they can escape is by performing a suspiciously specific action...
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Peter Grill and the Inescapable Room
Peter Grill et la pièce hermétique
Peter Grill to Zettai ni Derarenai Heya
ピーター・グリルと絶対に出られない部屋
